text: لَوۡ أَرَدۡنَآ أَن نَّتَّخِذَ لَهۡوٗا لَّٱتَّخَذۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّآ إِن كُنَّا فَٰعِلِينَ

translation.en: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so
translation.id: Seandainya Kami hendak membuat suatu permainan (istri dan anak), tentulah Kami membuatnya dari sisi Kami,530) jika Kami benar-benar menghendaki berbuat demikian
